page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: In the school there are 3 classes with a teacher each.{Class 1}- Mr.Tingay - Headmaster{Class 2}- Mrs Wilkinson {Class 3}-Mrs Hughes.The children start in class 1 just before they are 5. There are library corners in each class and we have some modern things like a computer and a photo-copier. There are approx.60 children in the school.Every Tues.the library van comes to school.Mrs Vasey is the cook and the caretaker is Mrs Watson.Hardly anyone ever sees her because she comes after school.We do P.E. in the Village Hall or the field. There is partition between the top and middle classes.It used to be all one big room.There are picture boards on each side.The middle and infant classes have whiteboards but the top class has a blackboard because Mr.Tingay prefers them.
